Sentence.value: This may be because you have injured the muscles, ligaments, or disks in your spine in the past.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: This may be because you have injured the muscles, ligaments, or [[disks|C0180459]] in your [[spine|C0037949]] in the past.

Sentence.value: And, the disks that act as cushions between the bones of our spine become more brittle as we age.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: And, the disks that act as cushions between the [[bones|C0262950]] of our [[spine|C0037949]] become more brittle as we age.

Sentence.value: To help prevent back pain and injury when you bend and lift: - Spread your feet apart to give your body a wide base of support - Stand as close as possible to the object you are lifting - Bend at your knees, not at your waist or back - Tighten your stomach muscles as you lift the object up or lower it down - Hold the object as close to your body as you can - Slowly lift, using your muscles in your hips and knees - As you stand up with the object, DO NOT bend forward - DO NOT twist your back while you bend to reach the object, lift the object, or carry the object - Squat as you set the object down, using the muscles in your knees and hips.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: To help prevent back pain and injury when you bend and [[lift|C0181620]]: - Spread your feet apart to give your body a wide base of support - Stand as close as possible to the object you are lifting - [[Bend|C0700231]] at your [[knees|C0022742]], not at your waist or [[back|C0004600]] - Tighten your [[stomach|C0038351]] [[muscles|C0026845]] as you lift the object up or lower it down - Hold the object as close to your body as you can - Slowly [[lift|C0181620]], using your muscles in your [[hips|C0019552]] and knees - As you stand up with the object, DO NOT bend forward - DO NOT twist your back while you bend to reach the object, lift the object, or carry the object - [[Squat|C0241236]] as you set the object down, using the muscles in your [[knees|C0022742]] and [[hips|C0019552]].
